description:
http://anidb.net/ch91671 [Takagi] and http://anidb.net/ch91670 [Nishikata]`s daughter. Similar to her mother, Chii is mischievous and enjoys teasing her father. Despite this, she is very easily embarrassed herself, a trait she takes after Nishikata. Chii is shown to be very loving and affectionate towards both of her parents.
Source: Takagi-san Wiki
name: Chii
